alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cattaraugus and Chautauqua Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clymer, or 21 miles east of Erie, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Lakewood, Falconer, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Chautauqua Institution, Findley Lake, Frewsburg, Chautauqua, Busti, Stockton, Gerry, Ellington, Celoron, Mina, Arkwright, French Creek and Sherman. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
